name: GX® 824
description: GX® 824 are sulfonated fluids that provide fast cooling and cutting capabilities to meet a wide range of anti-weld and lubrication requirements. GX® Premium Cutting Oils provide excellent cooling of cutting tools, thus reducing heat generation and extending tool life. GX® Premium Cutting Oils contain a combination of additives to provide moderate to severe service for fast and smooth metal removal, better surface finish, consistency, and long tool life. GX® Premium Cutting Oils prevent rust, corrosion, and oxidation to finished metal surfaces.
